Kingra (Punjabi: ਕਿੰਗਰਾ) is a village located in Faridkot district of Punjab State. The Village has a population of 1806 of which 948 are males while 858 are females as per the population census of 2011. The total geographical area of the village is about 643 hectares with 334 number of househlds. The postal code of the village is 151203.
